StringProperty.Name: MODEL_NAME
StringProperty.Description: The name of the model published in the database, also the name of the executable (possibly with an appended suffix). The default is the name of the grandparent folder of the project file.

StringProperty.Name: SCENARIO_NAME
StringProperty.Description: The scenario name or list of names to publish in the database. The default is Default. It can be list of names separated by semicolon

StringProperty.Name: MODEL_CODE_DIR
StringProperty.Description: The folder containing model source code modules (*.mpp, *.ompp, *.cpp, *.h). The path is relative to the project file. The default is ../code.

StringProperty.Name: SCENARIO_PARAMETERS_FOLDER
StringProperty.Description: The folder or folder list containing values of modifiable parameters (*.dat, *.odat, *.csv, *.tsv) for the published scenario(s). The path is relative to the project file. The default is ../parameters/Default. It can be a list of folders separated by semicolons.

StringProperty.Name: FIXED_PARAMETERS_FOLDER
StringProperty.Description: The folder containing values for invariant parameters (*.dat and *.odat) for the model. Invariant parameters are burned into the model executable and absent from the model user interface. The path is relative to the model project file. If empty, the fixed parameters folder is disabled. A typical value if enabled is ../parameters/Fixed. Parameters can also be made invariant using suppress_parameters and retain_parameters statements in model code.

StringProperty.Name: OMC_USE_DIR
StringProperty.Description: The folder containing common framework modules. The path is absolute. The default is $(OM_ROOT)/use.

BoolProperty.Name: USE_PCH
BoolProperty.DisplayName: Enable pre-compiled headers in C++ compilation

BoolProperty.Name: NO_LINE_DIRECTIVES
BoolProperty.DisplayName: Disable generation of #line directives by the OpenM++ compiler.
BoolProperty.Description: Use this option if the correspondence between model source and execution in the Visual Studio debugger seems erroneous. Please contact the OpenM++ team if this occurs.

BoolProperty.Name: RUN_SCENARIO
BoolProperty.Description: Run the scenario after building and publishing the model and scenario(s).

BoolProperty.Name: DBCOPY_EXPORT_CSV
BoolProperty.DisplayName: Export model run results into csv files
BoolProperty.Description: Export model run parameters and output tables into csv files

BoolProperty.Name: OPEN_MODEL_WEB_UI
BoolProperty.Description: Publish model in web-service and open model web UI using default browser
